message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $10,000.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $7,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $9,200. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still thinking $8,000 is a fair price for this product. Can you meet me at that price?
